name: Colour Change WIP
description:
You would need to use four different colours in order to complete the different puzzles and finish the game. 

Controls

Esc - Pause Menu

Powerup Control
0, 1, 2, 3, 4 - Change Control
Arrows, left shift, left control - control yellow powerup
Q - Pick up blue powerup
Left Control - drop blue powerup
R - Reset block position and rotation
O - Reset block rotation

Player
W, A, S, D - Control Player
Space - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Grapple
